author: Rachel Wyatt
comment: App was all good until it stopped being compatible with my husband's phone. Now I have to listen to him complain about it.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, due to security and support concerns we will no longer be able to offer the app on Android 4.3 and below. Operating systems older than Android 4.4 are no longer supported by Google. Your husband can still access the FastNet Classic Mobile site from his device.^MM

author: Santori Malinton
comment: The app is OK, stable and works on Moto G. Fonts could be bigger. When can I see my e-statements on the app?

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We'll pass your query about e-statements onto the team and let you know when we have an update.^MM

author: Hohepa
comment: Let me down

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback - are you able to give us some more information, so we can look to improve your experience with the ASB Mobile app?^MM

author: Dave
comment: Ok il bump you up 4 stars because you can stop being logged out if you change the settings. But due to the fact there is no way to share a transaction receipt to prove to someone you have in fact paid them. I cant give you 5 stars like the ANZ app.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Hi again, we do support fingerprint log in, if you have it enabled on your device you can go to settings - security in our app to switch it on. If you can send me some details we can look into the copy and paste issue, my email is MobileFeedback@asb.co.nz ^LF

comment: It doesn't show my last card transactions. I need to see them immediately in right order. What is the problem? All other banking apps do it precisely.

Stopped working on my phone with Android 4.2 Really? Bank apps should work in any version as it's not a game. Will start using another bank as I don't want to buy a new phone. Cannot upgrade Android on my current one.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, due to security and support concerns we will no longer be able to offer the app on Android 4.3 and below. Operating systems older than Android 4.4 are no longer supported by Google. You can still access the FastNet Classic Mobile site from your device.^MM

author: Val Christev
comment: Unable to use tap to pay on my new pixel 2 xl, the phone isn't officially released in nz so I'm guessing it isn't supported? I'm running stock Android 8.1, not rooted and bootloader locked.

author: Jaden Vlotman
comment: The UI looks so dated... you need to update it so it looks more like a modern 2018 app... Needs to be brighter with sharp edges and more 2D if you know what im saying... It needs to be more like ANZ and BNZ where the app is brighter...

author: Neb Sun
comment: Excellent app, very well designed and thought out. Easy to use. Im switching to ASB because of this app. - any chance of adding receipts or list of pending foreign exchange orders? would be useful

author: Charles Doole
comment: Updated review after response from ASB. Now I'm really happy with the app. Multitasking & finger print login were off by default, but one can opt-in via the settings.

author: Tani Singh
comment: Honestly this app is so bad compared to ANZ. ANZ's app is perfect this is just really overdue for an update. Please ASB update your app from 2011. It really needs a visual overhaul.

author: Andrew Broxholme
comment: Does not close when I got the X in the corner, or respond to clear all. Phone only three weeks old so there is an issue somewhere.

author: anon ymous
comment: Blocks screenshots. I'll just have to take a screenshot from my desktop instead, so it really doesn't secure anything.

author: thir carc
comment: Can't login to ASB securities. What a joke. Why do I need to login from my desktop to view my portfolio? Useless.

author: Michael Fulcher
comment: Awesome to be able to pay Trademe auctions and manage other payments on one app that gets the job done quickly and efficiently. Good Work.
Would love to give a higher score but due to not being able to log in via our adsl broadband connection is really annoying.

author: Rakesh Kumar
comment: Can't do automatic payments anymore.   I tried again on version 3.29.12  Still not being able to do automatic payments.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback - Automatic Payments are available in the latest version of the ASB Mobile App. Are you able to try again, and if you are still unable to complete your payment, give us a call on 0800 662 226 so we can get further information and troubleshoot this for you! ^MM

comment: Cannot get finger  print  to register or screen to create  Pin!

author: Peter Ball
comment: "Can no longer be used on this device". Security is the justification for this but the encryption algorithms available are not broken.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, due to security and support concerns we will no longer be able to offer the app on Android 4.3 and below. Operating systems older than Android 4.4 are no longer supported by Google. You can still access the FastNet Classic Mobile site from your device.^MM

comment: Works fine for what I need to do day to day.  Would be a really cool feature if you could get a notification for when you receive payment from someone

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback - we'll pass it on to the team! ^MD

author: Henry Jamieson
comment: It's quite good but would be much better if Samsung Pay was supported as it has usability on all terminals.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: •	Thanks for your feedback - we'll pass it on to the team! ^MM

author: A Google User
comment: Very good, just need to improve the fingerprint sensor. Didn't work all the time

author: D Flem
comment: Appreciate you cutting my use off to the app cause I can't afford a flash phone , cheers

author: Alistair Hansen
comment: Great app offers a lot of features... But I use the widget a lot if that can be enabled again please 😌

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Hi - are  you able to check Quick Balance is turned on in the ASB Mobile App? You can check in Settings>General>Quick Balance. Otherwise, flick us an email on OnlineMobileSupport@asb.co.nz and we can troubleshoot.^MM

comment: It does what I need it to do. Being able to switch credit cards on and off is a great security feature.
Simple and straight forward on what you need done. Quick and easy for anyone to use.. 5★ app

author: Liam Edwards
comment: Don't get me wrong, it's good for functions. But it needs a massive design overhaul.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback - we'll pass it on to the team! ^LF

author: cannon williams
comment: Good app n useful

author: Greig Family
comment: I can't have the device forgot me without reinstalling

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: You can deregister your device within the ASB Mobile App in Settings>Deregister this device or within FastNet Classic Internet Banking in Mobile Banking>Manage Devices. Please call 0800 662 226 for further assistance.^MM

author: Christopher Clarke
comment: Great interface, easy to use and good widget.

author: Nick Graham
comment: Easy to use. Does everything I want.
Pretty good

author: Meheer Zaveri
comment: Since the last update fingerprint login doesn't work. "Fingerprint recognised" appears but does not log you in. Nexus 6p, android 8.0.0 October security patch

author: FeaolPlay Leiataua
comment: App used to be great but now just crashes upon launch. Seems to have occurred after the latest security update, Xperia XZ Premium, Android 8.0.0

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content:
Hi there,
Sorry to hear this, if you have time could you please email me a few details and we'll investigate. My email is MobileFeedback@asb.co.nz. Thanks!^LF

author: A Google User
comment: Please add renaming accounts and allow reordering off accounts. Please allow u to view more than 3 months of transactions, 6months is a realistic limit for savings account where not many transactions are done. Please also be the first in NZ to process payments on the weekend!!!

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Hi there, just wanted to let you know the ability to edit automatic payments is included in our latest update. thanks for your patience ^LF

author: Matt W
comment: Good app, needs to have the function to delete accounts.

author: Chelsea Lee
comment: Would be nice if all the transactions had time stamps.

reply.author: ASB Bank Limited
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, I'll pass it onto the team.^LF

author: Chris Ward
comment: Use this app daily. Very good thank you
Cut us out from accessing the supermarket midstream no warning. What's going on?

author: Karen Leahy
comment: Does all normal banking transactions
